meta.Title: WORDS AND MUSIC [New York Times, Sunday, March 4, 1951]
meta.Author: Harold T. Bers

across.question: Alter to fit a new use.
He presides over the N. Y. Philharmonic.
Played by Leonard Rose and Piatigorsky.
She played a Count in "Die Fledermaus."

down.question: She returned to the Met this season.
His latest book is "Age of Faith."
